page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incidents.name: [Global][Hosted Exchange] - Mailbox sorting degradation
incidents.message: An incident is in progress on our hosted exchange offer. Please be aware that this is currently affecting the functionality. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 12/11/2024 18:13 UTC Service impact : Some mails from "ex-mail.biz" might not be moved to "undesirable" folder by automation. Ongoing actions : We are waiting an action from a related provider. Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

incidents.name: [GRA2][WebHosting] Log Access Cluster007
incidents.message: Start time : 18/11/2024 12:58 UTC End time : 18/11/2024 15:40 UTC Root cause : A malfunction in network equipment has had a temporary impact on access to logs and statistics for the hosting of cluster 007. We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [RBX/SBG][VoIP] - SIP maintenance notification
incidents.message: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

incidents.name: [Global][Collaborative solutions] - MX plan Incident Notification
incidents.message: Start time : 17/11/2024 18:10 UTC End time : 17/11/2024 18:25 UTC Root cause : Due to this incident https://web-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/2p4kmgnsdsk2, there was some latency on the MX Plan services for a period of 15 minutes. We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

incidents.name: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Delay in processing requests for offer changes
incidents.message: Start time : 14/11/2024 10:05 UTC End time : 14/11/2024 19:28 UTC Service impact : Some slowness can appear on upgrade and downgrade on change offer task launch on manager Root cause : Customers experienced latency when changing offer tasks on web hosting. We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident
